title: How to Make Friends in College: 5 Practical Tips
description: 5 tips to help you make friends in college
author: Madison Coombs
content:
5 tips to make friends in college:
1. Explore Clubs and Organizations
2. Dive into Campus Events
3. Turn Dorm Life into a Friend-Making Opportunity
4. Connect with Your Classmates
5. Make the Most of Your Orientation
